verses.verse: Remember <WH2142> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, what is come upon us: consider <WH5027> <WH8685>, and behold <WH7200> <WH8798> our reproach <WH2781>.
Our inheritance <WH5159> is turned <WH2015> <WH8738> to strangers <WH2114> <WH8801>, our houses <WH1004> to aliens <WH5237>.
We are orphans <WH3490> and fatherless <WH369> <WH1>, our mothers <WH517> are as widows <WH490>.
We have drunken <WH8354> <WH8804> our water <WH4325> for money <WH3701>; our wood <WH6086> is sold <WH935> <WH8799> <WH4242> unto us.
Our necks <WH6677> are under persecution <WH7291> <WH8738>: we labour <WH3021> <WH8804>, and have no rest <WH5117> <WH8717>.
We have given <WH5414> <WH8804> the hand <WH3027> to the Egyptians <WH4714>, and to the Ashurns <WH804>, to be satisfied <WH7646> <WH8800> with bread <WH3899>.
Our fathers <WH1> have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, and are not <WH369>; and we have borne <WH5445> <WH8804> their iniquities <WH5771>.
Servants <WH5650> have ruled <WH4910> <WH8804> over us: there is none that doth deliver <WH6561> <WH8802> us out of their hand <WH3027>.
We gat <WH935> <WH8686> our bread <WH3899> with the peril of our lives <WH5315> because <WH6440> of the sword <WH2719> of the wilderness <WH4057>.
Our skin <WH5785> was black <WH3648> <WH8738> like an oven <WH8574> because <WH6440> of the terrible <WH2152> famine <WH7458>.
They ravished <WH6031> <WH8765> the women <WH802> in TZiyon <WH6726>, and the maids <WH1330> in the cities <WH5892> of Y'hudah <WH3063>.
Princes <WH8269> are hanged up <WH8518> <WH8738> by their hand <WH3027>: the faces <WH6440> of elders <WH2205> were not honoured <WH1921> <WH8738>.
They took <WH5375> <WH8804> the young men <WH970> to grind <WH2911>, and the children <WH5288> fell <WH3782> <WH8804> under the wood <WH6086>.
The elders <WH2205> have ceased <WH7673> <WH8804> from the gate <WH8179>, the young men <WH970> from their musick <WH5058>.
The joy <WH4885> of our heart <WH3820> is ceased <WH7673> <WH8804>; our dance <WH4234> is turned <WH2015> <WH8738> into mourning <WH60>.
The crown <WH5850> is fallen <WH5307> <WH8804> from our head <WH7218>: woe <WH188> unto us, that we have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> !
For this our heart <WH3820> is faint <WH1739>; for these things our eyes <WH5869> are dim <WH2821> <WH8804>.
Because of the mountain <WH2022> of TZiyon <WH6726>, which is desolate <WH8074> <WH8804>, the foxes <WH7776> walk <WH1980> <WH8765> upon it.
Thou, O YY <WH3068>, remainest <WH3427> <WH8799> for ever <WH5769>; thy throne <WH3678> from generation <WH1755> to generation <WH1755>.
Wherefore dost thou forget <WH7911> <WH8799> us for ever <WH5331>, and forsake <WH5800> <WH8799> us so long <WH753> time <WH3117> ?
Turn <WH7725> <WH8685> thou us unto thee, O YY <WH3068>, and we shall be turned <WH7725> <WH8799>; renew <WH2318> <WH8761> our days <WH3117> as of old <WH6924>.
But thou hast utterly <WH3988> <WH8800> rejected <WH3988> <WH8804> us; thou art very <WH3966> wroth <WH7107> <WH8804> against us.
